text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Leek | settlement_type = Former municipality | image_skyline = Borg Nienoord.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Nienoord Castle | image_flag = Flag of Leek.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Leek wapen.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 0022 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Leek in a municipal map of Groningen | map_caption = Location in Groningen | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Municipality | subdivision_name2 = Westerkwartier | government_footnotes = | governing_body = Municipal council | leader_party = VVD | leader_title = Mayor | leader_name = Berend Hoekstra | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 2 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = Leekster | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 9350–9359, 9810–9819, 9827–9829 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 050, 0594 | website = | footnotes = }} Leek is a former municipality in the province of Groningen, the Netherlands. Since 2019, it has been part of the new municipality of Westerkwartier. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Settlements in Groningen (province) Category:Former municipalities of Groningen (province) Category:Westerkwartier
title: Leek, Netherlands
